II. Purpose of Addendum
The Licensee has requested to add residential treatment to the type of services
provided at this facility. The request is for 12 beds to be designated as treatment
and reduce the number of short-term beds to 18 to maintain the current capacity of
30 residents for this facility.
III. Methodology
07/28/2005 Onsite visit and review of the facility.
08/12/2005 Consultation meeting with facility representatives and contracted
services representatives.
09/27/2005 Received draft of program statement for treatment services.
11/29/2005 Received request for modification of terms for the license and the
finalized Program Statement and related materials for treatment
services.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
On 7/28/2005 this consultant visited this facility and concluded that the facility was
providing treatment services in a secure setting as well as short-term placement
services. The licensee has developed appropriate program statements and
description of services to add treatment services as a term to this license.
This modification request does not change the total placement capacity of this facility
so it does have sufficient and proper space to provide the treatment services.
Since the total capacity is not changed by this request the facility continues to have
adequate staff to accommodate the inclusion of treatment services for some of the
identified residents. The treatment services are provided through other appropriate
personnel on a contracted basis with the facility staff maintaining supervisory
responsibility for the residents. This arrangement allows the facility to appropriately
provide these additional treatment services.
V. Recommendation
This consultant recommends the modification of this license to include treatment
services in a secure setting.
